data.event: The population was 765 at the 2010 census, a decrease from 806 at the 2000 census.

event.title: were assigned to Union Parish Public Schools' Marion High School (K-12) until June 2013

data.event: Residents were assigned to Union Parish Public Schools' Marion High School (K-12) until June 2013, when the school closed down due to a lack of students in the 2012-13 school year.

event.title: 1971; principal auctioneer of American Quarter Horse, reared

data.event: Keith Babb, KNOE-TV personality prior to 1971; principal auctioneer of American Quarter Horse, reared in Marion prior to 1952, where his father, Keith Franklin Babb, was a Southern Baptist pastor
